data.author: Travis La Marr

changelog.release_notes:
- Added debugging to find a rare issue.
- Removed SDK 2 support. Update your pebbles.

üòç

- General UI Improvements
- UI refinements for Pebble Time Round
- Haptic feedback on events (Ready, Sent, Failed to send)
- Fixed a bug that wouldn't show an error when everything went wrong.

- Improved Javascript backend.
- Improved Communication between watch & phone
- Rewrote popups (Less crashy!)
- Fixed crashing on launch on Pebble & Pebble Steel to prep for future Timeline OS update
- Beta Pebble Time Round support (There's a few graphics glitches. Next update will have full round UI.)
- Switched app to HTTPS
- Improved login on launch
- New configuration page with Slate (Check it out!)
Reworked some of the UI. Looks much better now.

Added a new loading screen (Thanks to Mathew Reiss' dithering library).
Hopefully improved stability in communication to phone.

üêû fixed a rarely occurring bug.

Mostly nothing to see here.
üêû Fixed a possible connection issue that would let you sit at the Loading screen for a long time.

üêû: Fixed emoji's tiling on the right side of the screen.
üêû: Various bug fixes.
üí™: Rewrote app launch process. More reliable (Contact if having problems, please.) and properly detects Timeline token changes if you switch devices/watches.
üí™: App will properly display a status now if the other party has uninstalled Boopy and can't send emojis.
üí™: Server's more stable, and now supports password/username reset/retrievals
üí™: Added a new emoji. üòâ

üêû: Would allow you to connect to no user.
üêû: Showing the wrong status window showing and triggering the rate limiter.
üêû: On the server sending the wrong status when disconnected from the user.
Fired the developer. ...wait. that's me. üò≥
Minor bug fix. Many server side fixes have been deployed since release. Thank you to everyone who emailed bug reports.

data.description:
Don't forget to leave a ‚ù§Ô∏è if you like Boopy!

Boopy is the original Emoji messaging app for the Pebble Timeline.

Share a moment, and stay connected from across the world, or across the couch by sending a message to someone close, a friend, or anyone you pair with using some of your favorite emojis to your partner‚Äôs timeline on their wrist.

A boop isn‚Äôt just another meaningless notification you‚Äôll get and dismiss, it‚Äôs a notification to stir an emotion from someone close of your choosing. 

NOTE: Original Pebble and Pebble Steel need the timeline update to receive messages. Find out more on blog.pebble.com
